code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import BotCollection from"./components/BotCollection";import YourBotArmy from"./components/YourBotArmy";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[bots,setBots]=useState([]);const[army,setArmy]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://localhost:8001/bots").then(r=>r.json()).then(data=>setBots(data));},[]);function handleAddToArmy(bot){if(!army.find(b=>b.id===bot.id)){setArmy([...army,bot]);}}function handleRelease(bot){setArmy(army.filter(b=>b.id!==bot.id));}function handleDischarge(bot){fetch("http://localhost:8001/bots/".concat(bot.id),{method:"DELETE"}).then(()=>{setArmy(army.filter(b=>b.id!==bot.id));setBots(bots.filter(b=>b.id!==bot.id));});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Bot Battlr"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YourBotArmy,{army:army,onRelease:handleRelease,onDischarge:handleDischarge}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BotCollection,{bots:bots,onAddToArmy:handleAddToArmy})]});}export default App;
